hints.title: Foster-Lyapunov Drift (Unconditional)
hints.content:
7089: :label: thm-fl-recap
7090: 
7091: The composed operator $\Psi_{\text{total}} = \Psi_{\text{kin}} \circ \Psi_{\text{clone}}$ satisfies:
7092: 
7093: $$
7094: \mathbb{E}[V_{\text{total}}(S') \mid S] \leq (1 - \kappa_{\text{total}}\tau) V_{\text{total}}(S) + C_{\text{total}}
7095: $$
7096: 
7097: where:
7098: - $V_{\text{total}} = V_W + c_V V_{\text{Var}} + c_B W_b$ is a synergistic Lyapunov function
7099: - $\kappa_{\text{total}} > 0$ is independent of N
7100: - $C_{\text{total}} < \infty$ is the constant drift term

hints.label: thm-lsi-target
hints.title: Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality (Target)
hints.content:
7110: :label: thm-lsi-target
7111: 
7112: For all smooth functions $f: \mathcal{S}_N \to \mathbb{R}$ with $\int f^2 d\pi_{\text{QSD}} = 1$:
7113: 
7114: $$
7115: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
7116: $$
7117: 
7118: where:
7119: - $\text{Ent}_{\pi}(g) = \int g \log(g/\int g) d\pi$ is the relative entropy
hints.raw_directive:
7107: ### What We Want
7108: 
7109: :::{prf:theorem} Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality (Target)
7110: :label: thm-lsi-target
7111: 
7112: For all smooth functions $f: \mathcal{S}_N \to \mathbb{R}$ with $\int f^2 d\pi_{\text{QSD}} = 1$:
7113: 
7114: $$
7115: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
7116: $$
7117: 
7118: where:
7119: - $\text{Ent}_{\pi}(g) = \int g \log(g/\int g) d\pi$ is the relative entropy
7120: - $|\nabla f|^2 = \sum_{i=1}^N |\nabla_{x_i} f|^2 + |\nabla_{v_i} f|^2$ is the squared gradient

hints.label: ex-fl-no-lsi
hints.title: Random Walk on ℤ
hints.content:
7129: :label: ex-fl-no-lsi
7130: 
7131: Consider a lazy random walk on the integers with transition:
7132: $$
7133: P(x, x \pm 1) = \frac{1}{4}, \quad P(x, x) = \frac{1}{2}
7134: $$
7135: 
7136: and stationary measure $\pi$ geometric: $\pi(x) \propto e^{-|x|}$.
7137: 
7138: **Has Foster-Lyapunov**: With $V(x) = |x|$:
7139: $$
7140: \mathbb{E}[V(X_{t+1})] \leq (1 - c)V(X_t) + C
7141: $$
hints.raw_directive:
7126: **Foster-Lyapunov DOES NOT imply LSI** in general. Counter-example:
7127: 
7128: :::{prf:example} Random Walk on ℤ
7129: :label: ex-fl-no-lsi

7134: $$
7135: 
7136: and stationary measure $\pi$ geometric: $\pi(x) \propto e^{-|x|}$.
7137: 
7138: **Has Foster-Lyapunov**: With $V(x) = |x|$:
7139: $$
7140: \mathbb{E}[V(X_{t+1})] \leq (1 - c)V(X_t) + C
7141: $$
